levels.description:
The next attack deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all ground enemies in the 8 surrounding tiles, and restores <@ba.vup>{attack@sp}</> SP to anyone equipped with a Reliable Battery
<@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charges</>
